I'm Rishabh Gupta.

I am a final year Computer Science and Engineering student at Guru Ghasidas Vishwavidyalaya (a central university) in Bilaspur, Chattisgarh, India.

I did my internship at IIT Bombay under the Ekalavya Summer Internship Program - 2017.
